name: Pizza Bean FOREVER
description:
You work the graveyard shift in a pizzeria populated by animatronics, you will have to do tasks to keep your systems running such as, lights, cams, power, vents, and more. Will you survive Pizza Bean?

Credits

Scott Cawthon - music and inspiration

Tristan Mann - Voice of Miss Wicket

Gabriel Valerin - Voice of Teddy 

BR_FOX - Developer and voice of Mister Bean

FesliyanStudios.com - Other sounds

Nick Nightmare - Designs
